snippet.title: DOLLHOUSE: Behind The Broken Mirror - STORY TRAILER
snippet.description:
#dollhouse #dollhousegame #horrorgame 
Dollhouse : Behind The Broken Mirror and his story trailer. This first-person horror adventure game from SOEDESCO, developed by Indigo Studios and Grindstone, is set to launch on PS5 and Xbox Series X|S later this year. 
Get ready for a brand-new psychological horror experience as you venture into the sinister secrets of two nightmarish realms.

Dollhouse Behind the Broken Mirror on:

⚫Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1791660/Dollhouse_Behind_the_Broken_Mirror/
🔵PlayStation 5: https://store.playstation.com/es-es/concept/10010190
🟢Xbox Series: https://www.xbox.com/es-ES/games/store/dollhouse-behind-the-broken-mirror/9N0ST16VZV1C

00:00 Intro
00:18 Dollhouse Story
00:32 Explore a twisted reality
00:44 Terrifying atmosphere
00:54 Minigames Dollhouse
01:08 Dollhouse: Behind the Borken Mirror Wishlist Now

Follow SOEDESCO®!
Discord: https://discord.gg/soedesco
Website: http://www.soedesco.com/
Newsletter: https://bit.ly/2wsfR4f
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Soedesco
Twitter: https://twitter.com/soedesco
Instagram: https://instagram.com/soedesco

Video editors: 
@DanielFigaresYT 
@juanfranrivero

About SOEDESCO:
SOEDESCO is an independent video game developer, publisher, and distributor founded in 2002 by Soedesh Chauthi with its headquarters in Rotterdam, the Netherlands, and offices in Madrid, Spain & Pilsen, Czech Republic. We deliver creative content across multiple genres and platforms for a worldwide audience in physical and digital formats.
